prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling that takes precedence over my responsibilities to provide for myself and others in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully gambled, putting my family's financial needs at risk?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that excessively risked my ability to meet essential family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used financial resources in ways that excessively risked my ability to meet essential family needs, thereby manifesting a lack of prudent stewardship?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: through conversations or interactions with friends , family members , or acquaintances
with friends , family members , or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations or interactions with friends, family members, or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs through casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I derived pleasure in sharing others' private affairs through casual conversations, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private details about others for my own enjoyment
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private details about others for my own enjoyment, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in activities on a holy day of rest , such as Sunday , when otherwise it could have been avoided
on a holy day of rest
such as Sunday , when otherwise it could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I engage in activities on a holy day of rest, such as Sunday, when otherwise it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: towards my loved ones , neighbors , or fellow community members
rather than seeking reconciliation through prayer , dialogue , and forgiveness
anger.question: Have I nursed anger towards my loved ones, neighbors, or fellow community members rather than seeking reconciliation through prayer, dialogue, and forgiveness?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
